Common.disclaimer_txt: All of the properties listed below have been observed in laboratory tests. They are for information purposes only. All information contained in the descriptions has not been approved by GIS, GIF or EFSA. The substance is not a food product or a dietary supplement. It is not suitable for human consumption. The product is classified as a chemical reagent / reference material permitted for marketing in the EU. It may only be used for scientific research. Other information about the product is included in the chemical safety data sheet, which we provide for review. The products are available to institutions or individuals who are associated with research or laboratory activities.
Common.contact_desc: Do you have questions about therapy with tirzepatide? Do you want to learn more about individual products, such as semaglutide or retatrutyde? Contact us today! Our team of experts is ready to provide you with all the information. Just visit our contact page or call our hotline - we are at your disposal.
